summary: We reviewed how Department of Homeland Security law enforcement agencies use detection and monitoring technologies without warrants. These include drones and pole-mounted cameras used in public. This can raise civil rights, civil liberties, and privacy concerns. title: Law Enforcement: DHS Could Better Address Bias Risk and Enhance Privacy Protections for Technologies Used in Public
